theWidow:Cyberheart.NAME: Cyberheart
theWidow:Cyberheart.FLAVOR: It beats just the way you designed it to.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, #yUpgrade #b%d random cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

theWidow:WaterFilter.NAME: Water Filter
theWidow:WaterFilter.FLAVOR: A bit stale, but it'll keep you going.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yPotions have a #b%d%% chance to not be used up.

theWidow:HourglassMark.NAME: Hourglass Mark
theWidow:HourglassMark.FLAVOR: Usually considered an omen of impending doom.

theWidow:HoloProjector.NAME: Holo-Projector
theWidow:HoloProjector.FLAVOR: It's another you! Just not quite as coordinated.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain [E] and #yDowngrade #b%d random cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

theWidow:SewingKit.NAME: Sewing Kit
theWidow:SewingKit.FLAVOR: A great way to pass the time; and make something useful too.

theWidow:AnarchistsCookbook.NAME: Anarchist's Cookbook
theWidow:AnarchistsCookbook.FLAVOR: Every good wife needs a good cookbook.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, obtain a #yGrenade.

theWidow:PerfectHeart.NAME: Perfect Heart
theWidow:PerfectHeart.FLAVOR: Can you even call yourself human anymore?
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #pCyberheart. At the start of each turn, #yUpgrade #b%d random cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

theWidow:FluxCatalyst.NAME: Flux Catalyst
theWidow:FluxCatalyst.FLAVOR: A necessary component of making steel and other high-grade metals.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you Smith at Rest Sites, #yUpgrade two #brandom cards instead of one card.
